summary: Department of Defense financial management has been on our High Risk List since 1995 in part because of deficiencies found in its supporting information systems. DOD uses these systems to report its spending and assets. DOD's Inspector General and other auditors found the data used for the military services' FY 2019 financial statements unreliable. They identified new and ongoing deficiencies in 2,100 audit findings. DOD...
title: Financial Management: DOD Needs to Implement Comprehensive Plans to Improve Its Systems Environment
